welcome_message_body: Welcome to Madison, where charming lakes, vibrant city life, and a rich cultural scene await you. Explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in the unique blend of outdoor adventures, farm-to-table dining, and lively entertainment that Madison is known for. Enjoy your stay and make the most of your time here!

restaurants.name: The Red Pepperoni
restaurants.description: The Red Pepperoni is a pizzeria located in Madison.
restaurants.address: 842 W Main St (Cragmont Street), Madison, IN 47250

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dane County Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Dane County Regional Airport offers gates for domestic flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Dane County Regional Airport offers gates for international flights operated by select airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for the first hour and then a small fee may apply.
